channel.title: Dogwoof on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dogwoof on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Venice and Toronto-Bound ‘The Tale of Silyan,’ From Director of Double Oscar-Nominated ‘Honeyland,’ Boarded by Dogwoof (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Dogwoof has acquired international sales rights for “The Tale of Silyan” by the director of 2019’s double Oscar-nominated “Honeyland.” The film will receive its world premiere at the Venice Film Festi
